title: How do I set group contacts?
answer:
l   On the screen that you edit a contact, select a group in the **Group** field. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45286) 


 l   Touch **People**. On the **Groups** screen, select a group and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45287) to add members. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45288)
